sentence.Network_cn: 许多车在交通高峰时通过了高速公路.

entry.tran: 收费公路;(尤指)收费高速公路
entry.def: A turnpike is a road, especially an expressway, which people have to pay to drive on.

means.word_mean: 1. (from 16th to 19th centuries) gates set across a road to prevent passage until a toll had been paid
2. an expressway on which tolls are collected
